Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class GameViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the whole controller of the game scene

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    display()
    This method takes the current information from the game and draws it in the container
    void
    displayMessage(String message)
    This method is called from the view and displays the chat message received
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Method that is called when the fxml file is loaded It setups all the game board, shelf, common goals, chat for a correct showing of the images It also adds a listener when the component has a change in size It also sets up the grid pane
    protected void
    onChatButtonMouseClick()
    This method is called whenever the chat button is clicked.
    void

    Method that is called whenever the mouse is clicked on the game board canvas
    protected void
    onGameBoardCanvasDragDetected(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    This method checks if a drag is started on the game board If there is, it takes the image and the position and adds it to a clipboard, which lets the user drag the tile on the screen
    void

    Method that is called whenever the mouse is hovered/moved on the game board canvas

    This method is called whenever the move list canvas is clicked.
    protected void
    onMoveListCanvasDragDropped(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event)
    This method is called when the drag on the move list canvas is dropped.
    protected void
    onMoveListCanvasDragOver(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event)
    This method is called whenever the drag enters the move list, in order to set that image as a "target" where the move can be dropped
    void
    onMyShelfCanvasClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    Method that is called whenever the mouse is clicked on the shelf canvas It takes the column where the mouse clicks and tries to send the move to the server

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Method that is called when the fxml file is loaded It setups all the game board, shelf, common goals, chat for a correct showing of the images It also adds a listener when the component has a change in size It also sets up the grid pane
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      resourceBundle - something else

    • onGameBoardCanvasDragDetected

      protected void onGameBoardCanvasDragDetected(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method checks if a drag is started on the game board If there is, it takes the image and the position and adds it to a clipboard, which lets the user drag the tile on the screen
      Parameters:
      event - mouse dragged event

    • onMoveListCanvasDragOver

      protected void onMoveListCanvasDragOver(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event)
      This method is called whenever the drag enters the move list, in order to set that image as a "target" where the move can be dropped
      Parameters:
      event - mouse event

    • onMoveListCanvasDragDropped

      protected void onMoveListCanvasDragDropped(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event)
      This method is called when the drag on the move list canvas is dropped. It sets the move in the correct position based on where it dropped. The information is taken from what was moved on the clipboard
      Parameters:
      event - mouse event

    • onMoveListCanvasClick

      protected void onMoveListCanvasClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method is called whenever the move list canvas is clicked. It lets the user cancel a tile from the current move
      Parameters:
      event - mouse event

    • onChatButtonMouseClick

      protected void onChatButtonMouseClick()
      This method is called whenever the chat button is clicked. It distinguishes between the all chat and the private chat

    • showErrorAlert

      public void showErrorAlert(String message)
      This method is called whenever an error client side has occurred. It pops an alert to the screen showing the error message
      Parameters:
      message - error message to be shown
